metadata.title: CVE-2023-6477 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.5 before 16.7.6, all versions starting from 16.8 before 16.8.3, allversions starting from 16.9 before 16.9.1. When a user is assigned a customrole with admin_group_member permission, they may be able to make a group,other members or themselves Owners of that group, which may lead toprivilege escalation.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
